name: Four Points by Sheraton San Diego Downtown

reviews.text: We were part of a group reservation. It was a nice stay. Staff was really nice. They addressed every thing we asked of them, and did it with a smile. This is an older property, and it could definitely use a renovation. But it was comfortable and clean. Its right next to the freeway, so its a bit noisy. Not in the best neighborhood, but we walked around with no issues. Its not really near much, so you have to walk a ways to get to the main activity areas, and restaurants. Little Italy seemed to be the closest area, and it was 5-6 blocks. You have to walk by some homeless people, which is a little disturbing, but they didn't bother us. The location is about 1-1.5 miles from all the activity down by the conference center/gas lap area
reviews.title: Nice Stay, but not many amenities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room itself was nice. Beds were comfortable. Nice crisp bedding (I like that). The bathroom had a tub/shower, toilet, and a sink with a nice size counter. There was a magnifying mirror that you could use, which was a nice touch. The towels were fluffy and smelled nice. There was a flat screen tv, which we didnt use. Nice dresser area with drawers to put clothes, also a armoir type unit with an area to hang clothes. I think there were 8 hangers in there. Only 2 plugs in the whole room, though, so bring a power strip. (we did). The carpets were a stained and could definitely use a deep cleaning or replacement. The interior halls of the hotel were kept warm and felt almost moist. Not sure what that was about - the rooms were fine. Each room has an easy to adjust thermostat, which was nice.
reviews.title: Could be better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Small restaurant downstairs didnt have much to choose from, but the prices were decent and the service good. No breakfast included here.
reviews.title: Could be better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pool only, no jacuzzi. But the pool is quite warm. We heard its heated to 80 degrees. We were the only ones in there, so it was nice.
reviews.title: Not a Holiday Inn, but Four Points by Sheraton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Parking was $17 per day, not as steep as some other hotels in the area, but still a lot!
reviews.title: Do it yourself !

description: The recently-renovated Four Points by Sheraton San Diego Downtown is located minutes away from Little Italy, the Gaslamp Quarter, and Seaport Village. We also offer a free shuttle to/from the airport
